summary:
After analyzing the website https://www.eu-startups.com/directory/page/5/?dosrch=1&q&wpbdp_view=search&listingfields%5B1%5D&listingfields%5B2%5D=-1&listingfields%5B7%5D&listingfields%5B6%5D&listingfields%5B4%5D=2021, here's what information can be scraped:
Business Name
Category
Location (Based in)
Tags
Founded Year
Navigation links (Previous/Next)
Newsletter subscription form fields

content_zones.description: Contains the primary startup listing results
Repeated blocks containing individual startup information
Navigation controls for moving between pages of results

structural_characteristics: Grid-based layout with repeating listing cards
Consistent structure for each business entry
Pagination system for navigating multiple pages
Mixed content with sidebar navigation and main content area
scraping_challenges: Content appears to be loaded dynamically through a WordPress plugin (WPBDP)
May require handling pagination to get all results
CSS class names appear to be auto-generated and may change
No clear visual separation between different data fields in HTML structure
Potential need for session management if search filters are applied
